de.scravy.either

Class Either<L,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.scravy.either.Either<L,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - The left type.
    R - The right type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Either.Left, Either.Right

    public abstract class Either<L,R>
extends Object
    The Either type (an explicit sum type for Java).
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Julian Fleischer
